HOME_PAGE.MAIN_TITLE: Node Collaborative Ecology: The Way to Green Computing
HOME_PAGE.MAIN_DESCRIPTION: Discover iSunCloud: Innovating Green Computing with Shared Nodes for a Sustainable Future.
HOME_PAGE.NOTICE_DESCRIPTION: Beware of fraudulent activities!  We want to remind you that iSunCloud does not provide any form of financial advice, fund investments, or discretionary account operation. We also do not offer custody or management services for cryptocurrencies and trading activities. Furthermore, we do not draft any investment contracts for our users. If you receive any communications, messages, calls, or invitations through social media platforms to join investment groups that promise high returns and low risks, please immediately contact the Anti-Fraud Hotline at 165 for verification. Do not disclose any financial or personal information to these parties. Stay safe from scams.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: We utilize Zero-Knowledge Proof to facilitate data regulation within the blockchain ecosystem without compromising confidentiality.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_EFFICIENCY_DESCRIPTION: We integrate idle computing resources from around the world, offering cloud computing, network transmission, and artificial intelligence services.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: We also employ blockchain technology to provide fair rewards to each contributing machine for their computational power.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_INNOVATION_DESCRIPTION: Embracing blockchain technology opens doors to collaboration with other institutions, fosters innovation, and positions financial institutions at the forefront of technological advancements in the industry.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_1_TITLE: Zero-Knowledge Proof Data Compression and Packaging
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_1_DESCRIPTION_1: We enhance efficiency by compressing data sets off-chain, reducing on-chain processing costs.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_1_DESCRIPTION_2: Using advanced zero-knowledge proof tech, users submit secure data, meeting certification needs without privacy compromise.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_1_DESCRIPTION_3: This ensures blockchain storage with both credibility and privacy intact.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_2_DESCRIPTION_1: Using decentralized audits, we bolster data credibility and tamper resistance.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_2_DESCRIPTION_2: With internet and storage, anyone can be a witness, aiding oversight.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_2_DESCRIPTION_3: Our incentive system attracts more witnesses, fostering a robust blockchain ecosystem.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_DO_BLOCK_3_DESCRIPTION: Beyond BOLT nodes, data is sent to chains like Ethereum and Bitcoin using cross-chain protocols. This layered protection minimizes attack risks, ensuring rigorous safeguarding.
HOME_PAGE.CONTACT_US_DESCRIPTION: Please fill the form below, we will reply you as soon as posible.
HOME_PAGE.CONTACT_US_MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: What do you want to say...

OUR_HISTORY.MILESTONE_1_DESCRIPTION: A P2P advertising media company, we developed the earliest exposure proof of work technology.
OUR_HISTORY.MILESTONE_2_DESCRIPTION: focused on the research and development of distributed storage technology.
OUR_HISTORY.MILESTONE_3_DESCRIPTION: integrated distributed storage and blockchain  to achieve timed revenue-sharing streaming media.
OUR_HISTORY.MILESTONE_4_DESCRIPTION: Collaborated with academia to implement the BOLT second-layer blockchain solution and accounting auditing technology using cryptographic audit algorithms.
OUR_HISTORY.MILESTONE_5_DESCRIPTION: Improved BOLT with zero-knowledge proof technology to enhance privacy in blockchain.
OUR_HISTORY.MILESTONE_6_DESCRIPTION: We currently are researching and developing AI technology running on blockchain nodes to achieve AI-based accounting and auditing solutions.
